website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for a smaller toolbox that can fit into tighter spaces in a truck bed or platform.
pros: Dual barn-door design opens from the center, giving you better access to contents
Small profile with good depth provides plenty of space for small tools
Diamond-tread aluminum is attractive and sturdy
cons: Doors jut out from the base, taking up extra space

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for intended use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box to mount on the back of my fifthwheel trailer. Purpose of mounting a shore power cord reel and some miscellaneous power adapters and extension cord. Cord reel fit perfectly, the box looks great. Even the owner of the welding shop where I had an additional support brace installed commented on how well built the box is. Only flaw is the doors don’t quite align perfectly when closed, damn close but not high end kitchen cabinet close. Nothing to worry about. Only complaint is the logo was, as pictured, missing.
customer_reviews.author: Binford 5 K

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Clearly this is a good product but the packaging is dreadfully lacking. Door damage significant enough to make it practically unusable. I had to yank hard to get the door even open. For the price this should come perfect. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought tool box in the warehouse deals section, it was damaged and I got it for a great price, I am always worried when buying a damaged product, the hinges were bent and dent in one door but I was able to straighten the hinges and I made the dent almost unnoticeable I am very happy with this deal. buyers make good tool boxes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: It leaks! I tightened the latch per the instructions and it still leaks. I emailed Buyers and they told me to tighten the latch. Everything in it gets soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box but comes in a little short
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 18 x 18 x 48 but unfortunately that is not what showed up. I received one that was 18 x 15 x 48. Still works but with a some modifications.
customer_reviews.author: chris leone

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality boxes. Buyers is the way to go here.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Scratched and dented
customer_reviews.text: Delivered scratched and dented returned revived new one scratched and dented but box works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Box came locked if there are keys they must be locked in the box
customer_reviews.text: The box looks great - I took it out of the cardboard box it was shipped in and set the cardboard aside tried to open the Buyers Product Diamond box to no avail. It appears to be locked. Looked in the shipping carton and each side of the Buyers Product Diamond box no key to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boxes
customer_reviews.text: The boxes look great. They have a locking latch and seals to keep water out. Also there is no top or bottom so they can be installed with the latch door facing either forward or back.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice well-made box
customer_reviews.text: Like this to put on back of travel trailer to put two generators in. Lockable and good door seal.
customer_reviews.author: SARDOGDAD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Is mounted under our work truck and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: nosnow99

customer_reviews.title: Thanks so much for getting my orderto me as fast as yall did
customer_reviews.text: It was a great thing I am really happy with it. And I plan on getting more stuff as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double Barn-Door underbody tool box
customer_reviews.text: It is a great tool box. The only thing I do not like about it, is the fact that it doesn't have "Bolt-Holes" in it. I had to drill fresh holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice box. Not a lot lost in door opening as with some barn door boxes. However, as others mention it leaks (floods). I installed bulb gasket around the door frame and drilled drain holes in all four corners.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Buyers Products Diamond Tread Aluminum Underbody Truck Box w/Barn Door (18x18x36 Inch)
product_meta.description: Color:Silver Diamond Tread| Size:18x18x36 inchesProtect and secure your equipment for the long haul with an underbed truck box that offers convenient, easy access on the job site. Buyers Products Diamond Tread Aluminum Underbody Truck Box with Barn Door is crafted with thick diamond tread aluminum and reinforced side-hinged swinging doors that can be mounted to lock on either the right or left side. The "barn door" style allows you to get closer to the contents of the box, so back strain is reduced while you take advantage of the unobstructed space inside with no center post. A 3-point locking, die cast, compression latch system helps keep your tools safe from weather and theft. The truck box is built to perform for long life with an aluminum continuous hinge and a watertight D-bulb door seal. Choose a large or small truck box to fit your needs.
feature_bullets: Built tough with durable, corrosion-resistant, .100 in. thick diamond tread aluminum.
Contents stay safe behind a side-hinged barn style door with continuous aluminum hidden hinge with solid 1/4 in. pin.
Protect against weather and theft with 3-point locking, die cast compression latch system.
Easy access to contents with double swing out doors (right or left handle mount) and no center post to get in the way.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
